text: Not a worshipper but find this church interesting, culturally and architecturally.

This is a church with great and long history. Although there are a lot of senior citizens here, they are very friendly and vibrant.

There are services in Hakka, Philipines and also English. They have line dancing as well for the seniors to learn and befriend each other.
The strong ties among all the seniors are really very lovable. They are also very faithful to come church every week.

They also organise yearly trips to bond the seniors together.

#ILoveHakkaMethodistChurch
Lovely church. Has a great community and people here are really nice. About 6 minutes walk from Newton mrt and another 10 minutes from novena mrt.
There is tight parking within the premises. Worshipers will need to ark around the neighborhood on busy Sundays and other festive days.
